metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

children.name: Process Discovery
Improve on-time delivery performance & Reduce Manufacturing Cycle Time​
Cycle Time Process Order creation – Process Order: Set Deletion Flag​

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
(Select last(end_time) Filter(
Where event_name IN ('Deletion Flag')))
-
(Select first(end_time) Filter(
Where event_name IN ('Create Process Order')))
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Distribution of Cycle Time
Olap Table

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id, event_name, end_time
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORder by 1 desc
Limit 1

children.name: Time difference planned vs actual start date

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Scheduled Start Date" - "Actual Start Date" 
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Time difference planned vs actual start date with planned order

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Scheduled Start Date" - "Actual Start Date" 
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where "Planned Order Number" is not null

children.name: Copy of Time difference planned vs actual start date with planned order

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Planned Order Opening Date"  - "Actual Start Date" 
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where "Planned Order Number" is not null

children.name: Copy of Time difference planned vs actual start date with planned order

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Scheduled Start Date" - "Actual Start Date" 
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where "Planned Order Number" is not null
and "Scheduled Start Date" - "Actual Start Date" > Duration '0days'

children.name: Time difference planned vs actual start date without planned order

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Scheduled Start Date" - "Actual Start Date" 
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where "Planned Order Number" is  null

children.name: Copy of Olap Table

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id, "Scheduled Start Date" , "Planned Order Opening Date" , "Actual Start Date", "Basic Start Date"  
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where "Scheduled Start Date" is not null
and "Actual Start Date" is not null 
Limit 5

children.name: Time difference planned vs actual end date

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Scheduled Finish Date" - "Actual Finish Date" 
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Time difference planned vs actual end date without planned order

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Scheduled Finish Date" - "Actual Finish Date" 
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where "Planned Order Number" is null

children.name: Copy of Copy of Olap Table

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id, "Scheduled Finish Date" , "Actual Finish Date" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where "Scheduled Finish Date" is not null
and "Actual Finish Date" is not null 
Limit 5

children.name: Reduce manufacturing costs & Process Harmonization​
# Completed Process Orders without deletion flag​

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Technically completed')
AND "Deletion Flag" is null

children.name: # Process Orders without technical complete​

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE not event_name MATCHES ('Technically completed')

children.name: AVG Eckenddatum – Eckstartdatum

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Basic Finish Date" - "Basic Start Date" 
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Anzahl Teilrückmeldungen

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(event_name)
FROM Flatten(THIS_PROCESS)
Where event_name = 'Partially confirmed'

children.name: Teilrückmeldungen pro Tag

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', end_time) AS "Day", COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Partially confirmed'
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST

children.name: Copy of AVG Eckenddatum – Eckstartdatum over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', end_time) AS "Day", COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Partially confirmed'
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('DAY'), NULL

children.name: Copy of Copy of Olap Table

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id, "Basic Start Date" , "Basic Finish Date" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where "Basic Start Date" is not null
and "Basic Finish Date" is not null 
Limit 5

children.name: Olap Table

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id, 
"Planned Release Date", 
"Scheduled Release date",
"Actual Release Date", 
"Scheduled Start Date", 
"Actual Start Date",     
"Scheduled Finish Date", 
"Confirmed Finish Date",
"Actual Finish Date", 
"Basic Start Date",
--"Basic End Date",
"Planned Order Opening Date",
"Planned Order Start Date",   
"Actual Delivery Date",
"Planned Order Actual Delivery Date",
"Basic Finish Date"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Limit 10

children.name: Process & Conformance Improvements​
# Process Orders without Planned Order​

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Planned Order Number" is null

children.name: AVG Difference planned vs actual quantity (Process order)​

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Total Order Quantity" - "Produced Delivered Quantity" 
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where event_name MATCHES ('Delivered')

children.name: AVG Difference planned vs actual quantity (Process order)​ grouped by Division Text

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG ("Total Order Quantity" - "Produced Delivered Quantity"), "Division Text"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Delivered')
GROUP BY 2

children.name: AVG Difference planned vs actual quantity (Process order)​ over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST (end_time))) AS "Month", AVG ("Total Order Quantity" - "Produced Delivered Quantity")
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Delivered')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Table

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id, 
"Total Order Quantity" , "Produced Delivered Quantity" ,
"Total Order Quantity" - "Produced Delivered Quantity" as Difference
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where event_name MATCHES ('Delivered')

children.name: # Process Orders without business complete

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE not event_name MATCHES ('Confirmed')
or not event_name matches ('Partially confirmed')

children.name: General
Number of Process orders ​

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) as "# Process Orders"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Process orders ​ grouped by PO Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "# Process Orders", "Type"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 2
order by 1 desc

children.name: Number of Process orders ​ grouped by Business Line Short

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "# Process Orders", "Division"

GROUP BY 2

children.name: # Process Order Confirmations

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(event_name) as "# Process Order Confirmations"
FROM Flatten(THIS_PROCESS)
Where event_name IN ('Confirmed')

children.name: # Process Order Confirmations per Month​ over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', end_time) AS "Month", COUNT (EVENT_NAME) AS "# Process Order Confirmations"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Confirmed')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Automation
# Events grouped by User Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(event_name) as "# Events", 
event_name as "Event", 
"Event Created By User Type" as "User Type" 
FROM Flatten(THIS_PROCESS)
order by 1 desc

children.name: Overall Automation Rate

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(event_name) FIlter( Where
"Event Created By User Type" not in ('Dialog'))
/ count(event_name)*100
FROM Flatten(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Validation
Olap Table

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id, "event_name", "end_time", "Material Type", 
"Material Type Text"  
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "Material Type" IS NOT NULL  
ORDER BY 1 desc
LIMIT 1

children.name: Case Table
16. Production orders overdue for technical closure
Average cycle time
Process Discovery
Variable Importance
Bar Chart

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(event_name), event_name
FROM Flatten(THIS_PROCESS)
order by 1 desc
